description:
I have a bachelor's and master's degree from UFF, Brazil. I worked directly with data science for three years, and I had the opportunity to work with big companies, such as Ipiranga and Petrobras.

Before starting my data science journey, I have worked with web development for four years. Because of that, I'm very concerned about how the other teams will use my work. So I try to deliver something easier to use, improving the integration between the machine learning model and its application in the project.

items.title: Exacta - Puc rio
highlights: To support Petrobras's long-time strategy to inland freights, I collaborated on the freight prediction model's development.
To support Petrobras with warehouse sizing, I collaborated on the data analysis of the entire process of multiple materials to help the simulator model development.

items.title: Muxi
highlights: To reduce the response time of the Ipiranga promotional gateway support team, I developed a website based on the daily logs so the team could use more sophisticated search and visualization tools.
To reduce the response time of the Ipiranga infra team, I developed an alert to any inconsistency on the payment flow, so our infra could be more proactive in solving problems.

items.title: Eduapp
highlights: I collaborated on a school management website development in which a school could manage itself financially and academically.
I collaborated on a panel development to help schools analyze their students' performance by class and discipline.
